title: Keb Needs a Home
description: A hermit crab named Keb outgrows his shell and must find a new one. Keb is chased by seagulls and teased by other hermit crabs because he looks naked without a home. After trying out various homes, Keb finally finds a blue boot that has washed ashore.
meta: advantages, discarded, enormity, envious, handsome, proper, proportions, seaweed, spectacular
Problem and Solution : Analyze the problem and solution in a story
Quotation Marks : Understand the use of quotation marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
